jdbcService.sql: insert into node_locations ( id, created, modified, x, y, street_id, city_id, post_code_id, country_id, province_id, additional, number, district_id, first_name, last_name, priority, location_type_id, sector_id, node_id ) values ( :id, :created, :modified, :x, :y, :streetId, :cityId, :postCodeId, :countryId, :provinceId, :additional, :number, :districtId, :firstName, :lastName, :priority, :locationTypeId, :sectorId, :nodeId )
